jv_history.source_quote:
Talent at Cheil Agency Network 

New York, New York, United States (US) ... ### Joint CEO Talent Acquisition Executive Recruitment at Kay & Black, Talent Management ... Founded Kay & Black's coaching

what_you_do: I started my first blog in 7th grade and never looked back. Since then, I've had a long career blogging for brands and various publications, and an even longer career in social media for brands like Vine and University of Michigan. When Vine shut down in 2016, I began my journey as an entrepreneur, turned conversation design expert, speaker, educator, community host, mentor, strategic advisor and content creator.
who_you_serve: I'm currently based in Las Vegas.
social_proof: I also started cultivating a community that has now grown to nearly 3000 members. It's called Conversation Designers Internet Club.
signature_programs: In 2021 I launched a candidate-matching job board specifically for conversation designers, ConversationDesignerJobs.com, the first of its kind with the largest network of vetted conversation design talent in the world!
business_focus: I started my first blog in 7th grade and never looked back. Since then, I've had a long career blogging for brands and various publications, and an even longer career in social media for brands like Vine and University of Michigan.
service_provided: blogging, social media, conversation design, speaking, education, community hosting, mentoring, strategic advising, content creation
